snippet.title: Stormland | E3 Announce Trailer | Oculus Rift
snippet.description:
Visit https://ocul.us/Stormland to learn more about Insomniac Games and Oculus Studios’ next VR adventure, Stormland. Coming 2019, exclusively on Oculus Rift.

Deep sci-fi story. Revolutionary VR traversal. Unprecedented presence.
 
The Tempest shattered your android body. Now you must journey through an ever-changing cloudscape to augment yourself and save your friends. Explore an expansive world with complete freedom — bound up cliffs, glide across chasms, and fly through the slipstream with velocity. Detonate explosives, harness electricity, and wield makeshift weapons to overcome titanium sentries and monolithic guardians. Play single-player, or explore forgotten ruins together. It’s time to reclaim your world. 

Learn more about Insomniac Games: 
Website: https://insomniac.games/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/insomniacgames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/insomniacgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/insomniacgames/

Official Oculus Channels:
Oculus: http://ocul.us/Oculus 
Facebook: http://ocul.us/Facebook 
Twitter: http://ocul.us/Twitter 
Instagram: http://ocul.us/Instagram

Buy Rift: www.oculus.com/rift
Follow Oculus Rift on Facebook, Twitter, & Instagram:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OculusRift
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OculusRift
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oculusrift
